title: A Calm Whisper - A Short Story Collection
description: You can read one complete short story by scrolling down, under "Editorial Reviews" section."If you are looking for something to tell you a story of life and its ups and downs, uplifts and downfalls, then this is a must read." - Amazon Review"Wide Variety of Writers and Artists Make This Book Stand Out" - E. LucasBook Calm Whisper is a compilation of Short Stories, Free-Verse Poetry, and Art created by People from across the World. This book brings to you some unsung writers and artists. What is it to live when you have just a few months before you die? How a kid can change our perception about life and family? What is it to lose a brother? How a fatal surgery by a doctor can change his life? Many more such themes await you in the Short Story section of the book. Various forms of art - Pencil Shading, Watercolors, Digital Art are covered under Art Section. It is a small segment of the book, aimed at giving you a pleasant break from text-based reading.The pain of 9/11 US attacks, suicide, the hidden side among all of us, the greatness of friendship, the misery of losing a brother and much more, all under poetry section. These poems are in the free-verse form and easy to understand.One can relate to this collection in some way or the other and have a light and pleasant reading experience.
author: Akshat Singhal
